SuccessfulTransaction.name: Successful Transaction
SuccessfulTransaction.description: Query for a transaction hash that returns `SUCCESS` from the RPC node.

NotFoundTransaction.name: Not Found Transaction
NotFoundTransaction.description: Query for a transaction hash that returns `NOT_FOUND` from the RPC node.

FailedTransaction.name: Failed Transaction
FailedTransaction.description: Query for a transaction hash that returns `FAILED` from the RPC node.
